ModMetaData.name: Misc. MapGenerator
ModMetaData.author: Haplo
ModMetaData.description:
*** This needs Miscellaneous CORE to work without errors! ***
-Blueprint MapGenerator This will create some more detailed ruins on map creation. Some simple, some complex, some with items to be found, some with mechs,... You can also add your own ruin blueprints to the collection. (Note: This needs a new colony to work)
(Version: 0.13.3)
